import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { Button, Container, Row, Col, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { PostDTO } from './api/models/PostDTO'; import BlogPost from './BlogPost'; function BlogCard() { const [blogPost1, setBlogPost1] = useState(); const [blogPost2, setBlogPos2] = useState(); const [blogPost3, setBlogPost3] = useState(); const fetchBlogPost1 = () => { fetch("http://localhost:3000/post/pos1") .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setBlogPost1(data)) // assuming the array is stored in a property called posts .catch(error => console.log(error)); } useEffect(() => { fetchBlogPost1(); }, []); return ( {blogPost1?.author}
{blogPost1?.title}
{blogPost1?.text}
26 December 2019
Lorem Ipsum Dolor
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur, adipisicing elit. Recusandae voluptate repellendus magni illo ea animi?

); } export default BlogCard;
